description: Details required for Condition 6 (Construction Management Plan), 17 (Drainage Scheme) & 19 (Foul water scheme details) of Planning Permission ref: 22/02422/FUL (Erection of new dwelling house to rear of 15 Brook Gardens with associated landscaping, cycle storage and alteration to existing coach house.)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: In the absence of a sufficiently detailed Construction Management Plan, it has not been adequately demonstrated that the proposed development would safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers and the safety and operation of the highway network, contrary to policies T4 and T7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS7, DM9 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Insufficient details of the surface water drainage scheme have been provided to rule out the potential for drainage via infiltration and to demonstrate that the risk of flooding to and from the site has been satisfactorily managed, contrary to policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021, the Sustainable Design and Construction SPG 2014, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems 2015 and policy DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
